abilities.name: Backup
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have less than 6 cards in your hand, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. This power can't be used if Porygon2 is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Machine Burst
attacks.effect: If Porygon2 has a Technical Machine card attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep and Burned.
